docs.summary: Creates a new OAuth app for a Wix Headless client.
description:
An OAuth app authorizes an external client app or site, on any platform, to authenticate with a Wix site or project and manage its data.

> **Note:** The OAuth app secret is returned only when creating the OAuth app, and can't be retrieved later. Store the secret in a secure location.

params.name: oAuthAppId
params.doc: ID of the OAuth app to delete.

docs.summary: Deletes an OAuth app by ID.
description: > **Note:** After you delete an OAuth app, an external client can no longer make API calls by authenticating with its client ID.

params.name: oAuthAppId
params.doc: ID of the OAuth app to generate a secret for.

docs.summary: Generates a secret for an existing OAuth app.
description: > **Note:** You can only generate a secret once for each OAuth app, and the secret can't be retrieved later. Store the secret securely.

params.name: oAuthAppId
params.doc: ID of the OAuth app to retrieve.

docs.summary: Retrieves an OAuth app by ID.
Retrieves a list of OAuth apps, given the provided paging, filtering, and sorting.
description: Query OAuth Apps runs with these defaults, which you can override:
+ Results are sorted by `id` in descending order.
+ `paging.offset` is `0`.
|PROPERTY	|SUPPORTED FILTERS & SORTING
|`_id`|[`eq()`](wix-auth-management-v2.OAuthApps.OAuthAppsQueryBuilder#eq)|
|`_createdDate`|[`ascending()`](wix-auth-management-v2.OAuthApps.OAuthAppsQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-auth-management-v2.OAuthApps.OAuthAppsQueryBuilder#descending)|
|`name`|[`ascending()`](wix-auth-management-v2.OAuthApps.OAuthAppsQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-auth-management-v2.OAuthApps.OAuthAppsQueryBuilder#descending)|

params.name: mask
params.doc: Explicit list of fields to update. Only fields listed are updated.

description:
Only fields provided in `mask` are updated.

You can update the following fields:
+ `name`
+ `description`
+ `allowedDomain`
+ `loginUrl`

examples.title: updateOAuthApp example
body: const result = await oAuthApps.updateOAuthApp(id, oAuthApp, mask);

members.name: state
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'DEMO'`
- `'DISABLED'`
- `'ENABLED'`
- `'PENDING'`
- `'UNKNOWN'`

members.name: oAuthApp
members.doc: OAuth app to create.

members.name: oAuthApp
members.doc: Created OAuth app info.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

Pass the relevant cursor token from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of items to return in the results.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor string pointing to the next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to the previous page in the list of results.

members.name: deleteStatus
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'DELETED'`
- `'PENDING_PURGE'`
- `'TRASH'`
- `'UNKNOWN'`

members.name: oAuthAppId
members.doc: ID of the OAuth app to delete.

members.name: oAuthAppId
members.doc: ID of the OAuth app to generate a secret for.

members.name: oAuthAppSecret
members.doc: Secret generated.

members.name: oAuthAppId
members.doc: ID of the OAuth app to retrieve.

members.name: oAuthApp
members.doc: Retrieved OAuth app info.

members.name: newNamespace
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'ACCOUNT_MASTER_CMS'`
- `'ALBUMS'`
- `'ANYWHERE'`
- `'BRANDED_FIRST'`
- `'CLUBS'`
- `'CREATOR_ECONOMY'`
- `'DASHBOARD_FIRST'`

- `'DEV_SITE'`
- `'HEADLESS'`
- `'HOTELS'`
- `'HTML_DRAFT'`
- `'LOGOS'`
- `'ONBOARDING_DRAFT'`
- `'PARTNER_DASHBOARD'`
- `'RISE'`
- `'SHOUT_OUT'`
- `'SITELESS_BUSINESS'`
- `'UNKNOWN_NAMESPACE'`
- `'VIDEO_MAKER'`
- `'WIX'`
- `'WIX_STORES_TEST_DRIVE'`

members.doc:
Supported values:

- `'ALBUMS'`

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the OAuth app was created, in ISO 8601 format.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the OAuth app.

members.name: allowSecretGeneration
members.doc:
Whether a secret can be generated for this OAuth app.

Default: `true` until a secret has been generated for the OAuth App.

members.name: allowedRedirectDomains
members.doc:
List of domains to which redirection from Wix is allowed after processes other than authentication.

When a client redirects a user to a Wix page (for example, for checkout), the client provides a URL to redirect the user back to.
Wix only redirects the user if the URL is in one of the specified domains.

members.name: allowedRedirectUris
members.doc:
List of URIs to which redirection from Wix is allowed after authentication.

When a client redirects a user to Wix for authentication, the client provides a URI to redirect the user back to after the user has been authenticated.
Wix only redirects the user if the exact URI is contained in this array.

members.name: description
members.doc: Description of the OAuth app, as it appears in the dashboard.

members.name: loginUrl
members.doc: External login URL to which users are redirected automatically to authenticate. If no login URL is specified, the user is redirected to Wix to authenticate.

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the OAuth app, as it appears in the dashboard.

members.name: secret
members.doc: For internal use only.

description: An intermediary application that authorizes and authenticates an external client to access data on a Wix project or site.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"name","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"created_date","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options.

members.name: oAuthApps
members.doc: List of OAuth apps matching the query.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Paging metadata.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: Either UUID or EmbeddedServiceType.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: Not only UUID. Something here could be something weird.

members.name: context
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'DUPLICATE'`
- `'DUPLICATE_BY_SITE_TRANSFER'`
- `'FLASH'`
- `'FROM_TEMPLATE'`
- `'OLD_SITE_TRANSFER'`
- `'OTHER'`

members.doc:
Supported values:

- `'ALBUMS'`
- `'ANYWHERE'`

- `'RISE'`

- `'UNKNOWN_NAMESPACE'`
- `'VIDEO_MAKER'`
- `'WIX'`

members.name: originMetaSiteId
members.doc:
A meta site id from which this site was created.

In case of a creation from a template it's a template id.
In case of a site duplication ("Save As" in dashboard or duplicate in UM) it's an id of a source site.

description: Soft deletion of the meta site. Could be restored.
Hard deletion of the meta site.
First publish of a meta site. Or subsequent publish after unpublish.
Rename of the site. Meaning, free public url has been changed as well.

members.name: newOwnerId
members.doc: A new owner id (user that accepts meta site).

members.name: oldOwnerId
members.doc: A previous owner id (user that transfers meta site).

description: Site transferred to another user.
Restoration of the meta site.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

description: Assigned Studio editor
Unassigned Studio editor

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the OAuth app was created, in ISO 8601 format.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the OAuth app.

members.name: allowSecretGeneration
members.doc:
Whether a secret can be generated for this OAuth app.

Default: `true` until a secret has been generated for the OAuth App.

members.name: allowedRedirectDomains
members.doc:
List of domains to which redirection from Wix is allowed after processes other than authentication.

When a client redirects a user to a Wix page (for example, for checkout), the client provides a URL to redirect the user back to.
Wix only redirects the user if the URL is in one of the specified domains.

members.name: allowedRedirectUris
members.doc:
List of URIs to which redirection from Wix is allowed after authentication.

When a client redirects a user to Wix for authentication, the client provides a URI to redirect the user back to after the user has been authenticated.
Wix only redirects the user if the exact URI is contained in this array.

members.name: description
members.doc: Description of the OAuth app, as it appears in the dashboard.

members.name: loginUrl
members.doc: External login URL to which users are redirected automatically to authenticate. If no login URL is specified, the user is redirected to Wix to authenticate.

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the OAuth app, as it appears in the dashboard.

members.name: secret
members.doc: For internal use only.

members.name: oAuthApp
members.doc: Updated OAuth app details. May include some or all fields.

members.name: oAuthApp
members.doc: Updated OAuth app info.
